Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to TMS URL
3. Enter valid email and password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result:
- Redirected to Dashboard
- Welcome message displays
- User name visible in header
- Navigation menu accessible

Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid email or password
3. Click Login button
Expected Result:
- Error message displays
- Says invalid credentials
- Remains on login page
- Can try again

Steps:
1. While logged in click user menu
2. Click Logout button
3. Confirm if prompted
Expected Result:
- Logged out successfully
- Redirected to login page
- Session terminated
- Cannot access protected pages

Steps:
1. Login to TMS
2. Navigate to any page
3. Refresh the browser
Expected Result:
- Still logged in
- Same page displays
- No re-login required

Steps:
1. Login to TMS
2. Navigate to Dashboard
Expected Result:
- Dashboard page displays
- Shows greeting with user name
- Shows current date/time
- All cards load properly

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Look at Active Tasks card
Expected Result:
- Shows number of active tasks
- Count matches actual tasks
- Progress bar shows completion rate

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Look at Completed Tasks card
Expected Result:
- Shows number of completed tasks
- Accurate count
- Updates when tasks completed

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Look at Overdue Tasks card
Expected Result:
- Shows overdue task count
- Red/warning styling if any overdue
- Count is accurate

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Scroll to Recent Tasks section
Expected Result:
- Shows up to 3 recent tasks
- Shows task title and priority
- Shows due date and status
- Clickable to view details

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. View Upcoming Deadlines card
Expected Result:
- Shows tasks due within 7 days
- Shows urgency indicators
- Sorted by due date

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Click Manage Tasks quick action
Expected Result:
- Navigates to Tasks page
- Tasks page loads correctly

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Click View Calendar quick action
Expected Result:
- Navigates to Calendar page
- Calendar displays correctly

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Click View Profile quick action
Expected Result:
- Navigates to Profile page
- Profile information displays

Steps:
1. View Dashboard
2. Click Refresh button
Expected Result:
- Loading indicator shows briefly
- Data refreshes
- Updated counts display

Test Name: Tasks Page Loads with Kanban Board
Steps:
1. Click Tasks in navigation
2. View the page
Expected Result:
- Kanban board displays
- 4 columns: To Do, In Progress, In Review, Completed
- Tasks appear in correct columns

Steps:
1. Click New Task button
2. Fill in task title (required)
3. Add description (optional)
4. Select priority
5. Set due date
6. Click Save
Expected Result:
- Task created successfully
- Appears in To Do column
- Shows correct details
- Success toast appears

Steps:
1. Click on any task card
2. Or click View Details from menu
Expected Result:
- Task detail modal opens
- Shows all task information
- Shows title description priority
- Shows due date and status

Steps:
1. Find a task you created
2. Click Edit from dropdown menu
3. Modify task details
4. Click Save
Expected Result:
- Edit form opens
- Can change details
- Changes saved successfully
- Updated task displays

Steps:
1. Find a task you created
2. Click Delete from dropdown
3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result:
- Confirmation dialog appears
- Task deleted on confirm
- Removed from board
- Success message shows

Steps:
1. Click and hold a task card
2. Drag to different status column
3. Release the task
Expected Result:
- Task moves to new column
- Status updates automatically
- Toast confirms the change
- Change persists on refresh

Steps:
1. Find task assigned to you by someone else
2. Try to drag to another column
Expected Result:
- Task cannot be moved
- Shows Comment Only badge
- Must be task owner to move

Steps:
1. Type in search box
2. Enter part of task title
3. View filtered results
Expected Result:
- Only matching tasks shown
- Filters across all columns
- Search is case-insensitive

Steps:
1. Type in search box
2. Enter text from task description
Expected Result:
- Matching tasks displayed
- Searches description content

Steps:
1. Click task type filter dropdown
2. Select Individual
Expected Result:
- Only individual tasks shown
- Team and collaboration hidden

Steps:
1. Click task type filter dropdown
2. Select Team
Expected Result:
- Only team tasks shown
- Individual tasks hidden

Steps:
1. Click task type filter dropdown
2. Select Collaboration
Expected Result:
- Only collaboration tasks shown
- Other types hidden

Steps:
1. Click user filter dropdown
2. Select a specific user
Expected Result:
- Only tasks involving that user
- Shows their assigned tasks

Steps:
1. Apply one or more filters
2. Click Clear Filters button
Expected Result:
- All filters reset
- All tasks displayed again
- Dropdowns reset to default

Steps:
1. View tasks with different priorities
2. Observe priority indicators
Expected Result:
- Urgent: Red color
- High: Orange color
- Medium: Yellow color
- Low: Green color

Steps:
1. View task cards
2. Look at progress indicator
Expected Result:
- Progress bar visible
- Shows correct percentage
- Updates with task progress

Steps:
1. Have someone assign you a task
2. View your tasks within 3 days
Expected Result:
- NEW badge appears
- Shows on recently assigned tasks
- Disappears after viewing

Steps:
1. Open task details
2. Find comment section
3. Type a comment
4. Submit comment
Expected Result:
- Comment added successfully
- Shows in comments section
- Shows your name and timestamp

Steps:
1. Click Calendar in navigation
2. View the calendar
Expected Result:
- Calendar displays
- Shows current month view
- Event legend visible
- Tasks appear on due dates

Steps:
1. View calendar
2. Look for task entries
Expected Result:
- Tasks appear on their due dates
- Color coded by priority
- Shows task title

Steps: 1. On calendar click Week view button
Expected Result:
- Calendar switches to week view
- Shows 7 days
- Tasks visible on correct days

Steps: 1. On calendar click Day view button
Expected Result:
- Calendar switches to day view
- Shows single day detail
- All events for that day visible

Steps: 1. On calendar click Agenda view button
Expected Result:
- Shows list view of events
- Sorted by date
- Easy to scan upcoming items

Steps: 1. Click Previous arrow on calendar
Expected Result:
- Calendar shows previous month
- Correct month/year displayed
- Events for that month shown

Steps: 1. Click Next arrow on calendar
Expected Result:
- Calendar shows next month
- Correct month/year displayed

Steps:
1. Navigate away from current month
2. Click Today button
Expected Result:
- Returns to current month
- Today's date highlighted

Steps: 1. Click on any event on calendar
Expected Result:
- Event detail popup opens
- Shows event title and date
- Shows description if any

Steps:
1. On calendar page find sync button
2. Click Google Calendar Sync
Expected Result:
- Sync settings modal opens
- Can configure sync options

Steps: 1. View calendar on holiday dates
Expected Result:
- Holidays marked with purple
- Shows celebration emoji
- Holiday name displayed

Steps:
1. Click Profile in navigation
2. Or click View Profile from Dashboard
Expected Result:
- Profile page displays
- Shows user photo and name
- Shows role badge
- Shows statistics cards

Steps:
1. View profile page
2. Look at profile picture area
Expected Result:
- Photo displays if set
- Or initials shown if no photo
- Proper sizing

Steps:
1. Hover over profile photo
2. Click camera icon
3. Select image file
4. Wait for upload
Expected Result:
- New photo uploads
- Displays immediately
- Success message shows

Steps:
1. On profile click Personal Info tab
2. View the information
Expected Result:
- Shows First Name
- Shows Last Name
- Shows Middle Name
- Shows Contact Number
- Shows Position Title

Steps:
1. On profile click Organization tab
2. View the information
Expected Result:
- Shows Division
- Shows Department
- Shows Section
- Shows Team
- Shows Job Level
- Shows Hierarchy Level

Steps:
1. On profile click Account tab
2. View the information
Expected Result:
- Shows Email Address
- Shows Username
- Shows Account Created date
- Shows Last Updated date
- Shows Account Status

Steps:
1. View profile page
2. Look at stat cards above tabs
Expected Result:
- Shows Department card
- Shows Team card
- Shows Hierarchy Level card
- Shows Job Level card

Steps:
1. View profile page
2. Look near profile photo
Expected Result:
- Green Active badge if active
- Gray Inactive badge if inactive

Steps: 1. Click OSSB Requests in navigation
Expected Result:
- OSSB page displays
- Shows Incoming feature message
- Create button is disabled

Steps:
1. View OSSB page
2. Try to click Create button
Expected Result:
- Button is disabled
- Cannot click
- Tooltip shows feature disabled

Steps:
1. View OSSB page
2. Look at statistics cards
Expected Result:
- Shows Total Requests count
- Shows Approved count
- Shows Pending count
- Shows Draft count

Steps:
1. Click each menu item in navigation
2. Dashboard Tasks Calendar Profile
Expected Result:
- Each item navigates correctly
- Page loads for each selection

Steps:
1. Navigate to any page
2. Look at navigation menu
Expected Result:
- Current page menu item highlighted
- Visual indicator of active page

Steps:
1. View TMS on mobile device
2. Click hamburger menu icon
Expected Result:
- Navigation menu opens
- All menu items visible
- Can navigate to any page

Steps:
1. On mobile open navigation
2. Click a menu item
Expected Result:
- Navigates to selected page
- Menu closes automatically

Steps: 1. Create a new task successfully
Expected Result:
- Green success toast appears
- Shows Task created message
- Auto-dismisses after few seconds

Steps: 1. Update a task successfully
Expected Result:
- Green success toast appears
- Shows Task updated message

Steps: 1. Try action that fails (e.g. network error)
Expected Result:
- Red error toast appears
- Shows helpful error message
- Not technical jargon

Steps:
1. Try to delete any item
2. Observe before deletion
Expected Result:
- Confirmation dialog appears
- Asks Are you sure?
- Has Cancel and Confirm options

Steps:
1. Navigate between pages
2. Observe during data fetch
Expected Result:
- Loading spinner displays
- Indicates data loading
- Disappears when loaded

Steps:
1. View tasks page with no tasks
2. Or filter to show no results
Expected Result:
- Empty state message shows
- Helpful guidance displayed
- Suggests creating a task

Steps: 1. View Dashboard with no upcoming tasks
Expected Result:
- Shows appropriate message
- Not an error state

Steps:
1. Login as Leader
2. Click Team Overview in navigation
Expected Result:
- Team Overview page displays
- Shows team member list
- Shows team statistics

Steps:
1. On Team Overview page
2. Click on a team member card
Expected Result:
- Member profile modal opens
- Shows their full details
- Shows their tasks

Steps:
1. On Team Overview or Member Management
2. Click Assign Task on a member
3. Fill in task details
4. Submit
Expected Result:
- Task created successfully
- Assigned to selected member
- Appears in their task list

Steps:
1. Login as Leader
2. Click Member Management
Expected Result:

- Shows team members
- Shows task assignment options

Steps:
1. Login as Leader
2. View Dashboard
Expected Result:
- Shows team task statistics
- Shows active team members
- Leader-specific quick actions

Steps:
1. Login as Leader
2. View Dashboard Quick Actions
Expected Result:
- Team Overview option visible
- Assign Tasks option visible
